content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Around position x=1-3, y=1-3)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5) storing iron plates
- Additional burner inserter (5.5, 2.5) and wooden chest (5.5, 3.5) setup

### Copper Plate Production Line (Around position x=2-4, y=7-9)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5) storing copper plates

### Research Facility (Around position x=6-12, y=16-17)
Consists of:
- Two labs working on logistics research
- Connected to power network

### Power Generation System (Around position x=2-13, y=35)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5, 35.5)
- Boiler at position (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5, 35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electricity distribution network with multiple power poles

### Disconnected Structure
- Unused offshore pump at position (-5.5, 26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Boiler is not functioning due to lack of fuel - ensure coal is loaded into boilers to maintain power generation

### Storage Management
- Inserters are showing "chest is full" warnings - implement a system to manage full storage or add more storage capacity

### Fluid System Setup
- Disconnected offshore pump detected - ensure all fluid-related structures are properly connected to their intended systems
- When placing fluid structures, ensure they form a complete connected system from source to destination
